mapreduce

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapreduce.Context

  • public class Context
extends java.lang.Object

    Context Class

    Maps ouput key/value pairs and Reduces output key/value pairs.

    Since:
    2016-04-20
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ruinan, Karthik, Sujith, Naveen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Context

        public Context()

        Context default constructor

      • Context

        public Context(java.lang.Integer jobId,
               java.lang.String globalVal)

        Context constructor

        Initialize Context object with job identifier, global value and creates hash maps for both mapping and reducing keys.

        Parameters:
        jobId - Integer jobId identifier
        globalVal - String value used to store some parameters which can be used across the framework

    • Method Detail

      • getGlobalVal

        public java.lang.String getGlobalVal()

        Get the value of global value. Can be used to store some parameters which can be used across the framework.

        Parameters:
        none - no parameter required
        Returns:
        String - value representing global value.

      • writeMapper

        public void writeMapper(Writable key,
                        Writable value)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the mapper output to a context.
        Parameters:
        key - The key used as mapper output
        value - The value of mapper output
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
